sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"义务"或"职责"之意。
means: duty ： 指按道德和法律的标准，一个人永远要尽的义务，强调自觉性。
obligation ： 指道义上或法律上对他人的义务，强调强制性。也指因作出承诺而被迫履行的某种义务。
responsibility ： 指任何义务、职责、责任或职务上所尽的本分，强调对他人的责任。
function ： 指因职务或职业关系去履行某种职责。

sentence.Network_en: He wants companies to follow the European model of social responsibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 他希望各公司能够以欧洲公司为榜样，承担社会责任。

sentence.Network_en: Responsibility and moderation were to be the keynotes of their foreign policy.
sentence.Network_cn: 责任和克制将是他们外交政策的核心。

sentence.Network_en: Carrington held a position of responsibility within the government.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡林顿在政府机构身居要职。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 自作主张地；未经授权地

encyclopedia.content: 翻译 英汉辞典 n. 1. 责任[U][(+for)] A little child does not feel much responsibility. 小孩子不感到有什么责任。 2. 责任感[U] He is completely lacking in responsibility. 他完全没有责任感。 3. 职责， 任务； 义务， 负担[C] Keeping house is my responsibility. 管家是我的事。 4. 锛堉橇Γ 财力等方面的锛壴鹑文芰Γ 可信赖性[U]变化 名词复数：responsibilities辨析 同义： n.负责任 accountability accountablen

entry.def: If you have responsibility for something or someone, or if they are your responsibility, it is your job or duty to deal with them and to take decisions relating to them.

example.ex: Each manager had responsibility for just under 600 properties...
example.tran: 每位经理负责将近600处房产。

example.ex: We need to take responsibility for looking after our own health...
example.tran: 我们必须对自己的健康负责。

entry.def: If you accept responsibility for something that has happened, you agree that you were to blame for it or you caused it.

example.ex: No one admitted responsibility for the attacks...
example.tran: 没有人对这些袭击负责。

example.ex: Someone had to give orders and take responsibility for mistakes.
example.tran: 必须得有人下令，并为错误负责。

entry.def: Your responsibilities are the duties that you have because of your job or position.

example.ex: He handled his responsibilities as a counselor in an intelligent and caring fashion.
example.tran: 作为一名顾问他精明能干、热心周到。

example.ex: ...programmes to help employees balance work and family responsibilities.
example.tran: 帮助雇员兼顾工作和家庭责任的项目

entry.def: If someone is given responsibility, they are given the right or opportunity to make important decisions or to take action without having to get permission from anyone else.

example.ex: She would have loved to have a better-paying job with more responsibility...
example.tran: 她本想有一份报酬更高、职权更大的工作。

example.ex: Carrington held a position of responsibility within the government.
example.tran: 卡林顿在政府机构身居要职。

entry.def: If you think that you have a responsibility to do something, you feel that you ought to do it because it is morally right to do it.

example.ex: The court feels it has a responsibility to ensure that customers are not misled...
example.tran: 法院认为它有责任确保消费者不受误导。

example.ex: As parents we have a responsibility to give our children a sense of belonging.
example.tran: 作为父母，我们有责任给孩子一种归属感。

entry.def: If you think that you have a responsibility to someone, you feel that it is your duty to take action that will protect their interests.

example.ex: She had decided that as a doctor she had a responsibility to her fellow creatures.
example.tran: 她已经决定，作为医生，她应该对自己的同胞负责。

means.word_mean: 1. the social force that binds you to your obligations and the courses of action demanded by that force;

sentences.sentence: "we must instill a sense of duty in our children"
"every right implies a responsibility; every opportunity, an obligation; every possession, a duty"- John D.Rockefeller Jr

means.word_mean: 2. the proper sphere or extent of your activities;

sentences.sentence: "it was his province to take care of himself"

means.word_mean: 3. a form of trustworthiness; the trait of being answerable to someone for something or being responsible for one's conduct;

sentences.sentence: "he holds a position of great responsibility"

auth_sentence.content: It is not simply a question of personal responsibility.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is not simply a question of personal responsibility.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is not simply a question of personal responsibility.

auth_sentence.content: Focus on individual responsibility, guarantee of each other.
auth_sentence.res_content: Focus on individual responsibility, guarantee of each other.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Focus on individual responsibility, guarantee of each other.

auth_sentence.content: But I wanted to take more responsibility for things.
auth_sentence.res_content: But I wanted to take more responsibility for things.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But I wanted to take more responsibility for things.

stems_affixes.value_cn: [for,to]应负责的;可靠的;责任重大的
stems_affixes.word_buile: response[n.回答,响应,反应]+ible能……的→adj.[for,to]应负责的;可靠的;责任重大的
response[n.回答,响应,反应]+ibility表名词→n.责任, 职责

Sentence.sentence: Those who have a strong sense of responsibility.
I'll finish school in a few months, and I'd like a full-time position with more responsibility.
He prefers a full-time job with more responsibility

I think they do better academically and you can measure that very crudely from the examination results,I also think they do better academically because they have more opportunities to take the leading role in discussions and in managerial responsibilities.

Higher education has been able to duck this issue for years, particularly the more selective schools, by saying the responsibility is on the individual student," says Pennington of the Gates Foundation

Perhaps most significant, according to Mannaz, is the increasing interest large companies have in more collaborative management models, such as those prevalent in Scandinavia, which seek to integrate the hard and soft aspects of leadership and encourage delegated responsibility and accountability.

sentences.en: He has no responsibility for that accident.
sentences.cn: 他对那个事故没有责任。

sentences.en: The father of a family should have more sense of responsibility.
sentences.cn: 一家之父应有更多的责任感。

means.word_mean: 职责, 所负责任的事

sentences.en: Do you know the responsibilities of the government workers?
sentences.cn: 你知道政府工作人员的职责吗?

jushi.english: She has a lot of household responsibilities to do every day.
jushi.chinese: 她每天有数不清的家务事要去做。

jushi.english: The father of a family should have more sense of responsibility.
He has no responsibility for that accident.
jushi.chinese: 他对那个事故没有责任。
